front.title: RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) Block for MPEG2 Program Specific Information (PSI) Independent Transport Stream (TS) Decodability Statistics Metric reporting

abstract.t: An MPEG2 Transport Stream (TS) is a standard container format used in the transmission and storage of multimedia data. Unicast/Multicast MPEG2 TS over RTP is widely deployed in IPTV systems. This document defines an RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) Block that allows the reporting of MPEG2 Program Specific Information (PSI) Independent TS decodability statistics metrics related to transmissions of MPEG2 TS over RTP.
